body:
What the discussion topic says. I think it is a good idea, we could release many maps for the tournament at the same time.

Opinions?
body_tagged:
What the discussion topic says. I think it is a good idea, we could release many maps for the tournament at the same time.

Opinions?
title: Skywars Tournament?

replies.body: I don't think skywars has been perfected enough in order to be a tournament gamemode.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think skywars has been perfected enough in order to be a tournament gamemode.

replies.body: our skywars would suck for a tourney. the kits are garbage.
replies.body_tagged: our skywars would suck for a tourney. the kits are garbage.

replies.body: we have a skywars server? xd
replies.body_tagged: we have a skywars server? xd

replies.body: A problem will competitive skywars, and UHC, is the amount of random elements there are too it. The winner isn't always the best player, but rather the luckiest.
replies.body_tagged: A problem will competitive skywars, and UHC, is the amount of random elements there are too it. The winner isn't always the best player, but rather the luckiest.

replies.body: This might be the only chance Avicus has of running a good tournament with a large player count.
replies.body_tagged: This might be the only chance Avicus has of running a good tournament with a large player count.

replies.body:
I agree with {tag=54964b606ce749229a4c2b981d8c2ed7} here, it would give us some difference compared to other servers that only run DTM, CTF etc. 

But we would definitley have to evolve skywars before even thinking of a tournament.
replies.body_tagged:
I agree with Spoookeh here, it would give us some difference compared to other servers that only run DTM, CTF etc. 

But we would definitley have to evolve skywars before even thinking of a tournament.

replies.body: Who cares? "Lucky players" are allowed to win too. + that's the actual fun part of a SkyWars tournament
replies.body_tagged: Who cares? "Lucky players" are allowed to win too. + that's the actual fun part of a SkyWars tournament

replies.body: Well the next tourney is ctw/dtm and the one after that cill probably be koth and ctf probably, after that maybe lol but its questionable if their will actually be any team left in the next 6-9 months
